item.title: Tanuja add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Tanuja add a quote by Maxine Hong Kingston
item.description: "In a time of destruction, create something." -- Maxine Hong Kingston

item.title: Tanuja add a quote by Lauren Groff
item.description: "In the end, fiction is the craft of telling truth through lies." -- Lauren Groff

item.title: Tanuja add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Tanuja add a quote by Octavia E. Butler
item.description:
"All that you touch You Change.
All that you Change Changes you.
The only lasting truth is Change.
God is Change." -- Octavia E. Butler

item.title: Tanuja add a quote by Staceyann Chin
item.description: "I'm a woman. That means I break hard. And mend like a motherfucker; all sexy and full of heartbreakingly beautiful scars." -- Staceyann Chin

item.title: Tanuja add a quote by Henry Miller
item.description: "The aim of life is to live, and to live means to be aware, joyously, drunkenly, serenely, divinely aware." -- Henry Miller

item.title: Tanuja add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Tanuja add a quote by Warsan Shire
item.description: "My alone feels so good, I'll only have you if you're sweeter than my solitude." -- Warsan Shire

item.title: Tanuja add a quote by Warsan Shire
item.description: "You want me to be a tragic backdrop so that you can appear to be illuminated, so that people can say ‘Wow, isn’t he so terribly brave to love a girl who is so obviously sad?’ You think I’ll be the dark sky so you can be the star? I’ll swallow you whole." -- Warsan Shire
